Husayn_ibn_Ali_children.name: Ali Zayn al-Abidin
Husayn_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Also known as Imam Zayn al-Abidin. He was the fourth Shia Imam.

Husayn_ibn_Ali_children.name: Ali al-Akbar ibn Husayn
Husayn_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Killed at the Battle of Karbala.

Husayn_ibn_Ali_children.name: Sakinah bint Husayn
Husayn_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Also known as Ruqayyah. She was present at the Battle of Karbala.

Husayn_ibn_Ali_children.name: Ali al-Asghar ibn Husayn
Husayn_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Also known as Abdullah, he was an infant martyred at the Battle of Karbala.

Husayn_ibn_Ali_children.name: Fatimah bint Husayn
Husayn_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Married Hasan ibn Hasan (also known as Hasan al-Muthanna).

Husayn_ibn_Ali_children.name: Zaynab bint Husayn
Husayn_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Little is known about her life.
